sativa.description: Sativa strains are known for energizing and uplifting effects
sativa.characteristics: Tall plants with narrow leaves, longer flowering time

indica.description: Indica strains typically provide relaxing and calming effects
indica.characteristics: Short, bushy plants with wide leaves, shorter flowering time

hybrid.description: Hybrid strains combine characteristics of both sativa and indica
hybrid.characteristics: Varied characteristics depending on parent strains

thcaConversion.note: THCA converts to THC when heated (decarboxylation)

legalInformation.federalStatus: Hemp-derived products with <0.3% Delta-9 THC are federally legal
legalInformation.transport: Cannot cross state lines, even between legal states

usage: Do not drive or operate machinery
contraindications: History of psychosis or severe mental illness

faqs.question: What is THCA?
faqs.answer: THCA (tetrahydrocannabinolic acid) is the non-psychoactive precursor to THC found in raw cannabis. It converts to THC when heated through smoking, vaping, or cooking.

faqs.question: How long do effects last?
faqs.answer: Effects duration varies by consumption method: smoking/vaping (1-3 hours), edibles (4-8 hours), tinctures (2-4 hours). Individual factors also influence duration.

faqs.question: What's the difference between hemp and marijuana?
faqs.answer: Both are cannabis plants. Hemp contains less than 0.3% Delta-9 THC and is federally legal. Marijuana contains higher THC levels and has varying legal status.

faqs.question: Can I travel with cannabis products?
faqs.answer: Generally no. Cannabis products cannot cross state lines, even between legal states. Check local laws and transportation regulations.

faqs.question: How should I store cannabis products?
faqs.answer: Store in original packaging, in a cool, dry place away from sunlight. Use child-resistant containers and keep separate from food items.

faqs.question: What if I consume too much?
faqs.answer: Stay calm, hydrate, rest in a safe place. Effects will pass with time. Consider CBD products which may help counteract THC effects. Seek medical attention if severely uncomfortable.
